overview: If you have 10 minutes you can burn fat and enjoy dance moves like those you see in today's music videos regardless of your dance or exercise experience!  QuickFIX Cardio Hip-Hop workout uses specially designed combinations that are fun and easy to master.  Each routine begins with a dance "life-line" - one simple move you can always go back to should you ever lose your way.  As you learn each sequence, you can use your life-line to keep up the intensity of the workout and not miss a single minute of calorie burning time.
title: QuickFIX: Cardio Hip-Hop
